name: Omni-V ProtoDemo V0.0.0.0006
description:
This is a very early prototype of a larger game that is and will be in the works for some time. I hope to add alot more to this as time goes on. Tho this is rough I will keep working to flush out many things and add things such as FPS/TPS elements on top of the rpg base that has been started.
There is alot to do and I hope you all will enjoy the journey as I attempt to start development of a game of mine.

To close the info menu please click the red mark on the top left.

I will do what I can with what I have. If anything happens such as progress stalled/stopped. Then my PC bit the bullet as it is fairly old and have been having problems, and will have to hope I have saved everything correctly.
